entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
